name: The Christmas Gift Alpha 1.0
description:
This is a short visual novel about finding the perfect gift for Christmas.

This is an extremly early build. I literally spent like 3 days making it. I wanted it up for Christmas but I took too long. All music and images are fair use.

There are 8 possible endings.

It's faily short - 1 hour to 100%?

updates will be made later
